cause.description:
From the description at http://ucchoral.berkeley.edu/ucchoral/about.html :
UC Choral Ensembles, also known as UCCE, offers students many exciting learning and performance opportunities including the development of musical and vocal skills and the exploration of a wide-variety of musical styles. Performances range from formal concerts with professional soloists and orchestra to participation in Cal Spirit events. UCCE comprises nine groups: UC Men's Chorale, UC Women's Chorale, UC Men's Octet, California Golden Overtones, Cal Jazz Choir, Perfect Fifth, UC Alumni Chorus, BareStage, and Noteworthy.
1. UCCE needs and deserves your support.
cause.name: UCCE Love
